Xiaomi Mijia 17pin 400ML Star Fruit Cup Portable Juicer

The Xiaomi Mijia Fruit Cup 17pin 400ML Star Fruit Cup Portable Juicer is a ground-breaking invention that will transform your juicing experience with unparalleled convenience and efficiency. This juicer, designed with simplicity, lightweight construction, and portability in mind, reimagines on-the-go nutritional options. Its compact dimensions and ergonomic design make it ideal for travel, outdoor sports, or simply drinking fresh juice wherever life takes you. This juicer focuses safety while maintaining performance and aesthetics, thanks to its concealed blade mechanism. The blade is safely concealed during the juicing process, providing peace of mind and complementing the juicer's sleek and attractive appearance. Furthermore, the cup separation feature improves user convenience by intelligently identifying when the cup and body are separated and immediately turning off the motor to prevent accidents and extend battery life. This juicer is made from entire food-grade components such as PP, silica gel, and 304 austenite stainless steel, ensuring the safety and purity of your beverages, free of dangerous pollutants. Enjoy longer juicing sessions because to its long-lasting battery life, which can power up to 15 complete juice extractions on a single charge. This juicer has magnetic contact charging technology, which eliminates the need for bulky plugs and wires, and an LED work indication that keeps you informed of your juicing progress at a glance. Furthermore, the anti-slip silicone at the bottom of the cup ensures stability during use, preventing accidental spills and slips. With dimensions of 187mm70mm70mm and a net weight of around 495g, this juicer hits the ideal blend of compactness and practicality. The Xiaomi Mijia 17pin 400ML Star Fruit Cup Portable Juicer allows you to drink fresh and nutritious juice at any time and from any location, making it the best option for easy and healthy hydration on the go.

The Panasonic MX-EX1561 1.5L Blender is a multifunctional kitchen tool designed to make blending operations more precise and simple. This blender has a huge 1.5-liter capacity and is encased in a robust glass container, giving you plenty of room to make large amounts of smoothies, soups, sauces, and more. Powered by a powerful motor with a maximum locked wattage of 450W, it effortlessly pulverizes ingredients to provide smooth and consistent results every time. The Panasonic MX-EX1561 Blender, which has a rotary switch with two blending speeds and a pulse mode, gives you precise control over the blending process, allowing you to produce the texture you want. Furthermore, overheating and overload prevention systems are engaged to protect the motor from harm in the case of overloading, extending the blender's life and dependability. Whether you're making a morning smoothie or a batch of homemade salsa, this blender has the functionality, convenience, and durability you need to handle any blending activity with confidence.

Lesser Clumps, Smoother Texture

The sturdy stainless steel Saber Blades of Panasonic MX-EX1561 Blender include downward-facing blades that allow you to quickly scrape ingredients from the bottom of the jug while turning. This ensures equal mixing and cutting, which reduces the production of clumps.

Functional and Easy to Clean Glass Jug

The transparent glass jug of Panasonic MX-EX1561 is meant to be easy to clean and resistant to smells, scratches, stains, and discolouration. To wash away fibrous pulp, just disconnect the jug and blade base. You may also add solid or liquid components through the inside cover during mixing.

Handy & Convenient Dry Mill

A lightweight dry mill is useful for grinding entire spices into powder. The portable mill can grind up to 50 grams of dry materials at a time in Panasonic MX-EX1561 Blender. The black foundation makes food stains less obvious.

Safe & Reliable for Long-term Use

A safety lock protects your loved ones from inadvertent usage of Panasonic MX-EX1561. The thermal cut-off button also protects the motor from overheating damage caused by overloaded chemicals.

The Panasonic MJ-DJ31 3 in 1 Juicer Blender is a multifunctional kitchen equipment that effortlessly integrates the operations of a juicer, glass blender, and glass mill to suit all of your blending and juicing requirements. This appliance's three-in-one capability provides exceptional versatility, allowing you to easily transition between juicing, blending, and grinding operations. The Panasonic MJ-DJ31, with its stainless steel spinner and S-shaped cutter, securely keeps fruits in position for best juice extraction, ensuring you get the most out of your ingredients. The thin filter mesh effectively separates juice and pulp, resulting in a delicious and smooth drink every time. With a strong 800W max locked wattage, this blender can easily handle even the hardest fruits and vegetables. With a diameter of 75mm, the feeder tube can handle whole fruits and vegetables, eliminating the need for pre-cutting and saving time and effort. The Panasonic MJ-DJ31 has a 120-degree rotating anti-drip spout, allowing for convenient pouring in various directions while minimizing clutter and spillage. The appliance also has two-speed juicing settings for both hard and soft fruits, assuring the best results no matter what you're juice. This blender comes with a 1.5L juice cup and a 2.0L big capacity pulp container, giving you plenty of room to juice huge amounts of fruits and vegetables. Its elegant stainless steel body adds beauty to any kitchen while remaining useful and attractive. With the Panasonic MJ-DJ31 3 in 1 Blender, you can experience the convenience of numerous blending and juicing choices right at your fingertips.

Precise and Durable Full Metal Spinner

The Full Metal Spinner's S-Shaped Cutter of Panasonic MJ-DJ31 securely holds the fruit in place as it is juiced, and centrifugal force is used to remove the pulp. It squeezes more effectively since the fruit does not spin. The Low-Angle Cutter ensures thorough extraction, while the fine Filter Mesh separates the juice from the pulp, resulting in a delicious, thirst-quenching drink every time.

Large Feeding Tube

The feeding tube of Panasonic MJ-DJ31 has a diameter of 75 mm, which is large enough to accommodate full fruits and vegetables without having to chop them into little pieces. The huge, 2-liter pulp container allows you to prepare many batches of juice.

Enjoy a Richer Variety of Beverage

With the interchangeable Panasonic MJ-DJ31 Blender Mug and Dry Mill, this one appliance may function in three different ways. This allows you to prepare fiber-rich smoothies by incorporating fruit peels and vegetable hard cores. The Dry Mill offers rich, powerful coffee made from freshly ground beans, as well as a selection of spices.

Panasonic MX-M210SSL 1.35L Blender

The Panasonic MX-M210SSL 1.35L Blender is a flexible and efficient kitchen equipment designed to make blending jobs easier and more precise. With a powerful 220-240V power supply and a frequency range of 50-60Hz, this blender provides constant and dependable performance to fulfill your different blending demands. With a power consumption of 240W to 260W and a maximum motor lock wattage of 450W, it provides strong blending capabilities, easily crushing even the toughest ingredients. The Panasonic MX-M210SSL Blender, with its sturdy plastic motor housing, is designed to resist the rigors of daily usage, assuring long-term durability and performance. The simple press-button switch type allows for straightforward operation, while the blender's high rotation speed of 11,000 rpm provides effective blending. This blender has two sets of jug capacity, with a rated capacity of 1.0L and a maximum capacity of 1.35L, giving you plenty of room to mix huge amounts of ingredients to perfection. The stainless steel cutter ensures accurate and efficient blending, while the removable blade base allows for easy cleaning and maintenance, resulting in hassle-free operation. For increased versatility, the Panasonic MX-M210SSL Blender has one set of dry mill attachments, enabling you to easily ground a range of dry items. In addition, the blender has a C5 plug and a circuit breaker for increased safety during operation, giving you piece of mind. Whether you're making smoothies, sauces, soups, or dips, the Panasonic MX-M210SSL 1.35L Blender combines dependability, performance, and simplicity.

Panasonic MX-M100 1L Durable & Lightweight Blender

The Panasonic MX-M100 1L Blender is a dependable kitchen appliance intended to make blending activities more efficient and precise. With a strong 450-watt motor, this blender easily handles a variety of ingredients, providing smooth and consistent results every time. With a big 1.0-liter blender jar capacity, it can easily handle both small and large amounts of ingredients. The sharp and sturdy Stainless Steel cutting blade enables complete blending, and the accompanying scraper makes combining simple, maintaining consistency in your recipes. Its simple ON/OFF switch allows for easy use, making it suitable for users of all skill levels. The blender has a circuit breaker and a safety lock for further protection while in operation. Whether you're making smoothies, sauces, or soups, the Panasonic MX-M100 Blender combines power, simplicity, and safety features to improve your cooking experience.

Easy Blending with Centralized On/Off Switch

Once you've added the materials, simply push the switch of Panasonic MX-M100 Blender. While monitoring the blending status, you can effortlessly flip the switch on or off. The scraper helps blend the components while mixing.

Lightweight, Easy to Wash

The lightweight plastic container of Panasonic MX-M100 Blender is easy to use, particularly for cleaning. The safety lock operates when the jug is not correctly adjusted. When the circuit breaker is overloaded, it stops the motor from failing and quickly safeguards it.
